item.title: My husband plans to leave his entire estate to his adult son, who steals his credit card to gamble online. What can I do?
item.description: “Dementia runs in my husband’s family. My husband’s son has been known to take money from his dad without permission.”

item.title: America’s job market is eerily similar to the 1990s dot-com boom — just before the bust
item.description: March 20 marks the 25th anniversary of the dot-com bust. Could it happen again?

item.title: Inflation and tariffs might scare shoppers. Have they scared CEOs?
item.description: Executives are talking a lot about tariffs, but little about a recession. Adobe, Oracle and more retailers report during the week.

item.title: I fled our $2.2M home due to domestic abuse. I’m on the loan, but we’re both on the title. My husband won’t sell. What now?
item.description: “He contributed a $1 million down payment. I mortgaged the rest in my name.”

item.title: I signed a prenup, but my husband refuses to make a will or set up a trust. If he dies, will I inherit his estate?
item.description: “He has one adult son from whom he is estranged. He is 71 and I am 69.”
